CHAT.comment: child teaches mother to make a small figure jump up and down three times and sit on a minature park bench. child tends to speak with a rising intonation so many declarative sentences are marked with question intonation. It is often difficult to judge , both for the investigator and the coder , whether the child is asking questions or making statements.

u.a: refers to the participation gift the examiner has in the props bag .

CHAT.comment: child teaches mother to make a figure jump over a large figure , run around a small figure and then sit on the bench.
child teaches mother to string beads; first a round one and then a square one.

u.a: talking very softly as he demonstrates .
